docs.title: Dice Game in Haxe with Command Line Application and Web Application
docs.text: This is a dice game that rolls specified number of dice and shows the dice numbers for each die with the sum of all dice. It also has a web application that can be used in the browser to roll the dice and shows the dice numbers with the sum of all dice.

docs.title: Dice Game in Command Line Application in Haxe
docs.text: This is a dice game app using Haxe. It uses a command line interface to enter the number of dice and prints the dice output. It also prints the sum of all dice.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
1. Clone the repository: git clone https://github.com/lulunac27a/dice-game-haxe.git
  2. Change the directory: cd dice-game
  3. Build the app: haxe build.hxml

docs.title: Dice Game in Web Application using Haxe and JavaScript
docs.text: This is a dice game with a web application that uses Haxe to compute to JavaScript code. It uses HTML to process input how many dice are to roll and also displays the sum of all dice.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
1. Clone the repository: git clone https://github.com/lulunac27a/dice-game-haxe.git
  2. Change the directory: cd dice-game-webapp
  3. Build the app: haxe build.hxml

After running this code above, open index.html in your browser and enter the number of dice to roll and click Roll Dice button to roll the dice.
